title: Celestial Body
description: A schema for representing a celestial body in the solar system.

name.description: The common name of the celestial body.

semi_major_axis_au.description: The semi-major axis of the orbit in astronomical units (AU).

eccentricity.description: A measure of how much the orbit deviates from a perfect circle.

inclination_deg.description: The orbital inclination in degrees relative to the ecliptic plane.

argument_of_periapsis_deg.description: The argument of periapsis (or perihelion) in degrees.

longitude_of_ascending_node_deg.description: The longitude of the ascending node in degrees.

mean_anomaly_deg.description: The mean anomaly at a specific epoch, in degrees.

density_g_cm3.description: The average density in grams per cubic centimeter.

type.description: The classification of the celestial body (e.g., 'planet', 'dwarf planet').
